channel.title: CVE Feed for expresstech -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for expresstech -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-36864|2024-09-17T02:20:57.107Z -- expresstech -- quiz%20and%20survey%20master%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Auth. (editor+) Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in ExpressTech Quiz And Survey Master plugin <= 7.3.4 on WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2022-41652|2024-09-17T01:01:28.515Z -- expresstech -- quiz%20and%20survey%20master%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Bypass vulnerability in Quiz And Survey Master plugin <= 7.3.10 on WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2021-36865|2024-09-17T03:38:38.119Z -- expresstech -- quiz%20and%20survey%20master%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Insecure direct object references (IDOR) vulnerability in ExpressTech Quiz And Survey Master plugin <= 7.3.4 at WordPress allows attackers to change the content of the quiz.

item.title: CVE-2022-40698|2024-09-17T00:46:22.569Z -- expresstech -- quiz%20and%20survey%20master%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Auth. (subscriber+) Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Quiz And Survey Master plugin <= 7.3.10 on WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2022-25602|2024-09-17T01:20:54.950Z -- expresstech -- responsive%20menu%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Nonce token leak vulnerability leading to arbitrary file upload, theme deletion, plugin settings change discovered in Responsive Menu WordPress plugin (versions <= 4.1.7).

item.title: CVE-2021-36906|2024-09-17T03:18:17.849Z -- expresstech -- quiz%20and%20survey%20master%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Multiple Insecure Direct Object References (IDOR) vulnerabilities in ExpressTech Quiz And Survey Master plugin <= 7.3.6 on WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2023-28787|2024-08-06T15:16:34.491Z -- expresstech -- quiz%20and%20survey%20master
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in ExpressTech Quiz And Survey Master.This issue affects Quiz And Survey Master: from n/a through 8.1.4.

item.title: CVE-2023-28787|2024-08-02T13:51:38.328Z -- expresstech -- quiz%20and%20survey%20master
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in ExpressTech Quiz And Survey Master.This issue affects Quiz And Survey Master: from n/a through 8.1.4.

item.title: CVE-2024-3592|2024-08-01T20:12:08.048Z -- expresstech -- quiz%20and%20survey%20master%20%28qsm%29%20%E2%80%93%20easy%20quiz%20and%20survey%20maker
item.description: The Quiz And Survey Master – Best Quiz, Exam and Survey Plugin for WordPress plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to SQL Injection via the 'question_id' parameter in all versions up to, and including, 9.0.1 due to insufficient escaping on the user supplied parameter and lack of sufficient preparation on the existing SQL query. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to append additional SQL queries into already existing queries that can be used to extract sensitive information from the database.

item.title: CVE-2023-51507|2024-06-14T01:01:47.258Z -- expresstech -- quiz%20and%20survey%20master
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in ExpressTech Quiz And Survey Master.This issue affects Quiz And Survey Master: from n/a through 8.1.16.

item.title: CVE-2024-3592|2024-06-07T13:15:27.338Z -- expresstech -- quiz%20and%20survey%20master%20%28qsm%29%20%E2%80%93%20easy%20quiz%20and%20survey%20maker
item.description: The Quiz And Survey Master – Best Quiz, Exam and Survey Plugin for WordPress plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to SQL Injection via the 'question_id' parameter in all versions up to, and including, 9.0.1 due to insufficient escaping on the user supplied parameter and lack of sufficient preparation on the existing SQL query. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to append additional SQL queries into already existing queries that can be used to extract sensitive information from the database.

item.title: CVE-2024-27966|2024-06-04T17:46:49.277Z -- expresstech -- quiz%20and%20survey%20master
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in ExpressTech Quiz And Survey Master allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Quiz And Survey Master: from n/a through 8.2.2.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in ExpressTech Quiz And Survey Master.This issue affects Quiz And Survey Master: from n/a through 8.1.4.

item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in ExpressTech Quiz And Survey Master.This issue affects Quiz And Survey Master: from n/a through 8.1.16.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in ExpressTech Quiz And Survey Master allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Quiz And Survey Master: from n/a through 8.2.2.
